phases.content: Phase 5.1: Create payment state management (payment-store.ts, use-payment-status.ts)
Phase 5.2: Payment method selection UI (payment-method-selector.tsx, payment-method-card.tsx)
Phase 5.3: PayNow QR display component (paynow-qr-display.tsx, qr-save/share buttons)
Phase 5.5: Payment status tracker with polling (payment-status-tracker.tsx, success/failed pages)
Phase 5.7: Error handling & edge cases (network failures, expired sessions, duplicates)
Phase 5.8: E2E testing & QA (Playwright tests, Lighthouse CI, visual regression)
